entry.title: U.S. Seeks Help From Arab States to Plan Gaza Governance After War
entry.content: While some see a role for Qatar, Washington and its partners are struggling to enlist volunteers.

entry.title: Israeli Forces Move to Cut Gaza in Two, Isolating the North
entry.content: Troops moved closer to the center of Gaza City, backed by airstrikes and some gunfire from warships offshore.

entry.title: Pakistan Begins Deporting Afghans Who Fled Taliban
entry.content: Pakistan started rounding up tens of thousands of undocumented Afghans for deportation back to the country they fled, prompting fears that some awaiting resettlement to the U.S. could be swept up.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What to Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.
